summary: A few Ningheim presets based on the same face model.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Yv6NL2u.jpg[/img]

This is a reworked and (hopefully) improved preset built from my previous [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70532/?]Lorena preset[/url]. 
All these presets have the same facial features, just different eyes, hair, makeup and warpaints, so if you want to customise her yourself, you only need one. Choose the basic Belladonna or Anneli presets depending on which eye mods you prefer or have installed. I gave them different names just to give them a different personality matching their new look.

Install with an installer or extract to your SKSE/Plugins/CharGen/Presets folder.

Requirements for all:
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35474/?]The Ningheim Race
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos - Renewal

[/url]
[b][size=5]Eyes[/size][/b]
For Anneli and Annabel Lee:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49963/?]True Eyes - The Ningheim Addon

[img]http://i.imgur.com/RILSKje.jpg[/img]
[/url][img]http://i.imgur.com/mJLsrBt.jpg[/img]


For Belladonna and Hella:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty [/url]- The Ningheim Addon is found on the comments for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35474/?]Ningheim Race
[/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/NlVpnFs.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/PiXsC2J.jpg[/img]

[size=5]Warpaint[/size]
For Annabel Lee:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45641/?]Ravens Warpaint[/url] - Pack 8-10 (Floral) (I use the standalone)

For Hella:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34539/?]Battle Hardened Warpaints
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61332/?]Empyrean Warpaints
[/url]
Strictly speaking the eyes and hair mods are not [u]required[/u], you can use other mods as long as they are compatible with Ningheims.
Hella and Annabel Lee should load fine without installing the right warpaints, but they may load some other installed or vanilla warpaints. 

[size=5]Recommended[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Face Light[/url] - You want to be able to see your character, right?
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31665/?]Better Makeup for SKSE[/url] -  Download the Hi Res Female Face makeup and manually overwrite the Ningheim tintmasks or change the folder pathways to Ningheim ones. Subtle difference, but recommended for screenshots.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67483/?]Rampage ENB
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39821/?]HRK ENB
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56020/?]AIR ENB[/url]
author: Kamihana
